website_summaries.verdict: Offers the classic pump silhouette with a shorter heel for extra comfort and stability.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors and upper materials
cons: Design leaves a gap at the heel for many reviewers

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. It goes perfectly with a new dress I just bought. However, as cute as they are, they are extremely uncomfortable. They have a hardness that inside that makes them hard to walk in. For the money and the name brand I expected a much more comfortable shoe. I’m keeping them because I looked for that color of shoe for a long time and I don’t think I’ll find that color in any other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Heichel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awful! I guess them being Calvin Klein I expected more too. Color is beautiful but they are so uncomfortable and they shouldn’t be!!!! ITS A KITTEN HEEL ugh!! And sizing up would not help, they fit they are just uncomfortable and on top of that-they squeak and make all sorts of weird noises when you walk, it’s laughable. I recycled the box otherwise they would have gone back but now I’m stuck with shoes I will never wear.
customer_reviews.author: mimiwoo

customer_reviews.title: 5 and it fits perfect! I was gonna return it but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these just to fit, i wear sz 5, i ordered sz 5.5 and it fits perfect! I was gonna return it but it was too cute(coz i ordered another pair) Told my hubby if i can just keep it for mother’s day!😝 It felt soft on my feet. The heels were just right. I would buy the other colors when the budget it right! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 loves online shopping!

customer_reviews.title: One new shoe, one defective
customer_reviews.text: Box was dirty upon arrival, one shoes was wrapped in tissue like it was new, and the other shoe had a heel that looked like it had been twisted sideways. Returning immediately, for the price I expect much, much better. I would not buy these off of Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: kate12345

customer_reviews.title: these are beautiful shoes however
customer_reviews.text: these are beautiful shoes however, they hurt like he'll on the outside of my feet. It could be just me, but I couldn't use a larger or smaller size. Size was great, they just have some kind of invisible stitching or something that is really very very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoes, so comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes, so comfortable and pretty. I bought them in black from Nordstrom, wanted them in nude, so happy to find them on Amazon! They look great with jeans, but I can also wear them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are NOT made for walking on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Love the way they look but they make too much noise in the heel area when I am standing still and shift my weight. I feel like the itty bitty heel is going to break at any time. I regret spending the money the shoe. I wouldn’t purchase again. Unfortunately I could hear the noise on carpet. I didn’t hear it until I was embarrassed in a quiet elevator.
customer_reviews.author: MMMLMM

customer_reviews.title: Used Shoes right out the box!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't need these shoes until today! Right out of box they were used/worn! See attached pictures. Unacceptable and past the return cut off date. Not to mention I normally wear a 9 or 9.5 but the toe box on these was very narrow. Could have gone up a half size. Guess I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not true to size. Just for the heck of it, I decided to try the Calvin Klein brand. Big mistake. They tend to run large, and the size 4M did not fit. Attractive shoe, though. Just sorry shoe manufacturers are not consistent in their sizing. I can wear a Naturalizer 4M and it fits just right.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P.

customer_reviews.title: Red shoes very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I get tons of compliments when I wear these shoes by many women. Some women just stare but say nothing not sure what that’s about but whatever. There really pretty. The only reason I gave them a 4 is because after hours I wish they had some padding like the wonderful Rock Port Shoes. They don’t have Red shoes in Rock Port. If you like padding there just the same price as these shoes take a look at there shoes there fabulous. I know we’re not talking about Rock Port Shoes but I just had to tell you. Order half size up just a little tight. Good luck with your selection.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One of my few best investments. I will buy another pair in a ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my few best investments. I will buy another pair in a heartbeat if these are to get worn out. They are soft to the feet and the soft platinum color gives them that very chic and classy look. I wear them on special occasions; and they go so well with formal and informal outfits.
customer_reviews.author: CKiiru

customer_reviews.title: comfortable yet issue with toe color on pewter pair
customer_reviews.text: My issue with this particular shoe is that I wore it ONCE to church & unconsciously tapped my foot on pew (legs crossed just swaying foot). I was not doing it hard (it’s Church & obviously not loud or hard tap-nor continual; however, noticed at end of service the grey/pewter part of toe had worn off a bit! Not thrilled at all; I’ll try customer service but my guess it they were worn outside (I do have 2 other pairs that have been perfect) The shoe is very comfortable (just don’t like the toe piece)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe n fit but the upper material stinks. Not leather or pleather that I have every smelled???
customer_reviews.author: AKT

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the heel height. However, this shoe is definitely sized for a narrower, smaller foot. I ended up giving these to a friend who is 1/2 size smaller and narrower. This is a cute shoe, just sorry it didn't fit me.
customer_reviews.author: mrsfischyone

customer_reviews.title: I Could not wear these
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are pretty but they seem to be running on the small side. I wear a size 10 shoes. These shoes were too small and too narrow. Not to mention very hard and uncomfortable. For the money they cost i expected better.
customer_reviews.author: honda

customer_reviews.title: Not really padded
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this 2 days. Day 2 felt better than day 1 but still slightly painful. I will try it a few more days and will update. It looks very nice and many have asked about it. I hope the painful feeling will go away because they are super cute. The size is correct. A few months later - the fitting is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Wanya

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but run small or sent wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful and look nicely made. They run VERY small unless I was sent the wrong size. I usually wear a size 9 or 9.5, I ordered a 9.5, the box is marked 9.5, there is no size on the inside or outside of the shoe but they barely fit. I strongly suspect the shoes are actually a size 8.5. I could get them on but they are at least one whole size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy-Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work shoes. I wore these for the first time at a networking event so I was on my feet most of the evening. They are nicely padded and the heel higher is just right. My feet felt fine at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Great color & heel. Shoe runs small/narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The grey color is beautiful -deeper grey than I've seen with other brands -- and the kitten heel makes these shoes stylish and comfortable. I wear a size 9.5 in most shoes, but found that the the 9.5 was too tight. I hesitated on ordering the larger size because most 10s are too long and my heel slips, but I took a chance an ordered the 10. The size 10 fit perfectly! So if you have wider toes, I'd suggest ordering a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: SR, Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: They run small and they are definitely not the softest shoe. I have not tried on a shoe that doesn’t move. Especially.. CK
customer_reviews.author: Janine Warn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but small
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a 9.5 in closed toe shoes, 9 otherwise. Have 2 other pairs of Calvin Klein heels in 9.5 and they fit fine. These are definitely sized smaller. Would suggest going up 1/2 size if you're between sizes. Nice color and cute heel.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie71

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoe; fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: It's slightly tight in the toe area but no more so than any other pointy kitten heel pump. Pretty comfortable compared to most. Very pretty. Bought the red rock color and it's a beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: 9 fit more like 8.5. I don't have a single shoe in my closet that's a 9.5, I'm a solid 9, but these are too small. Not sure if it's worth ordering the 9.5 because I'm thinking it might be too loose in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Just Looking

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MATERIAL-not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: I treated my self and splurged on these shoes for my new job.. I was very excited because I have had a good experience with Calvin Klein shoes, they usually last and stay in excellent condition. With that being said, I worse these shoes ONCE, once and this is what they look like. I work in an office setting and I don’t walk or live in any environment that would cause this.. I don’t know what this is or why but I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lovelyyousif

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the leopard print version of this shoe and it is gorgeous. I love that the heel is low so that I can wear them just about anywhere. They are super-comfortable to walk in, although I caution against folks with wide feet purchasing these. The shoes are a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: violetcherry

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNCOMFORTABLE FOR CK
customer_reviews.text: Just love the shoe, purchased 2 more pairs in different colors. UP DATE purchased black and beige I tried the black pair on and had to take them off immediately soo uncomfortable beige ones came wrapped in plastic no box same thing extremely uncomfortable...I wonder if they are real CALVIN KLEIN
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Color is pretty. I’ve gotten complements. I have a wide foot but this shoe fits comfortable at my regular size of 7.5. The heel is an odd height that took a bit getting used to but a solid shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly the product as looks in the photo. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly the product as looks in the photo. I own lot of tall heels log float style but this specific style is pure quality and pure fitting heels.
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: only lasted a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: For the money I paid, they only held together for three weeks. Shoes I purchased at Target lasted longer. heels fell apart and then went in the trash. Definitely a big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: jade99

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace a pair of taupe kitten shoes I had but could not find anything close to the color these are perfect. As with all shoes they were a little snug at first but I put them on with a pair of socks and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: 1b20

customer_reviews.title: Chic but too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is beautiful no doubt, because I love Ck shoes , but this shoe is very narrow and the sizing is wrong. You can go more if it fits tight because will end up too big. I got a 9.5 which is half size up ,for comfort but was too tight then bought another in size 10 and it was too large and uncomfortable. Because I love the shoe I kept them
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I’m def a 9 1/2 on mostly all shows, these were wayyyyy too small and the size up was more expensive, very disappointed at this purchase
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pump. However I had to return it because I have wide foot and 9.5 wide is always unavailable. Gave a try on 9.5. They are very comfortable and have a lot of support however wide would have been a more comfort fit for my foot
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Shade
customer_reviews.text: A special convention. I needed a low heel, due to a lot of walking. These fit the bill just right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive looking and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive looking and comfortable. Great metal detail and metallic sheen class up a kitten heel. Technically, I’m a 10W but order 11 in Calvin Klein shoes. My aging feet can walk all day in these. I bought a 2nd pair for when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look
customer_reviews.text: The color and style excellent! However the shoe runs narrow. I purposely tried the shies on at the end of my day and they were wuite tight. So if they are tight at the end of a busy day, then they would definitely be hurting if I started my day into being busy...oouch!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Gray~Cook

customer_reviews.title: Look good, comfortable in the house
customer_reviews.text: Not yet had a chance to wear for work. Hoping there’s no issue. Taking off a star due to the brass thing at the back of the heel. Some may like the embellishment, but I don’t care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Skredberry

customer_reviews.title: They fit!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear 7m in dress shoes, and these fit perfectly. I like that they have cushion inside, but I wish I could remove them so I can put my own arch supports in .
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Toe crushers
customer_reviews.text: Order a 9/12 but the toe was sooo narrow that if I went up a size they would still crush my toes and be way too long. I have a narrow foot but these are real toe crushers. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Calvin Klein Women's Gabrianna Black Kid Skin Pump
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, timeless and stylish - even for a basic black pump. Heel height is perfect and still looks dressy.
customer_reviews.author: CMOLE

customer_reviews.title: 2 Left Feet!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were BOTH LEFT FEET! Can’t give a good review. The left foot looked great. The right foot was weird in a mismatched Shoe. 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a low but classy black leather pump. I have always been pleased with the kitten heel look. It's old classic that never goes out of style and the comfort you can't compare with any other. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Classic navy pump
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pump. Detail at the heel is a nice touch. Comfortable, classic look. Pointed toe so I had to reorder initially from a 8.5 (my usual size) as it fit too tightly on my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. A classic stable in the wardrobe for business attire. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: M&C Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: CC gabrianna Pump
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather, nice height and comfortable for walking around the office all day. Like the design, also.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Kangalee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe! A little snug but they will stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! A little snug but they will stretch because they are leather.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with these shoes. Not only are they cute, but very comfortable. I can wear them all day long with out my feet hurting by the time I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Siegel

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable I can wear them all day long every day and not have any issues. : )
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Really wished they fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoe started out comfortably, than it started rubbing my toes. Im going to return
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe
customer_reviews.text: This show is far prettier than I had expected. Very high quality
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Defectives
customer_reviews.text: The price is fine, the quality is fine, however, each pair I received had detectives. The first pair I got had a gap between shoes and heels, but still wearable. The replacement one had thread residual and hurt feet. I am tired of replacement and in a hurry to use the shoes, so I have to keep the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes I’m very glad I bought these heels love them very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Molina

customer_reviews.title: beautiful looking classy shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The toe was a bit tight but otherwise fit me well. Black dye came off on my feet
customer_reviews.author: History buff

customer_reviews.title: Not an everyday work shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the regular width but it stretch out after a few wears a little disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Constance A. Delancy

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are made wonderfully and the lipstick red color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I am still deciding if I will keep the shoes. They are slightly narrow for a medium and I am considering if I want to try to stretch them out or order a wide? The shoes are made very well with nice and expensive looking details. I bought them for a wedding in Jan. To match address I just purchased and they match perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jabs

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but heels wore quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and I love the heel height, but the caps wore down pretty quickly. Plan to get them recapped soon after purchase. The actual shoes are holding up well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Very true to size
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect as the picture stated, 8 1/2 fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Suga

customer_reviews.title: Nice kid leather
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is made of nice leather and quickly conforms to your foot. These are very classy and elegant shoes and look as good as those costing a lot more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Shoe peeling off on second day of wear
customer_reviews.text: Wore it for the second time today. Too layer is peeling off from 3 different places. Never had this issue with any other Calvin Klein shoes. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Gee

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe and color. It's comfortable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana D

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe but not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the shoe but the construction seems a bit haphazard -I can see glue in multiple places on the underside of the sole and heel and the shoe color is not centered or matched up with the sole. Shoe was comfortable when I tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: Eliabethe

customer_reviews.title: Sizing slightly off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10s, because I wear a 9.5-10. These are a hair snug.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Records

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I like them , however, I did not like the heel. I prefer a 2 inch heel.
customer_reviews.author: rose medina brown

customer_reviews.title: Wear To Work
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly and the heel was low and comfortable enough for an 8-10 hour work day.
customer_reviews.author: Syl C

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, live heel height as I can’t wear 3” heels all day anymore! But the shoe is a bit narrow across the toe box and the edge of the leather cuts into my foot, unfortunately I’m returning. The shoe was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best leopard shoe
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a bunch of leopard shoes and these were the winners for their rubber sole and sleek style.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Lynn

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful with all the black clothes I have. very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Fran S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes are Comfortable and go with everything! They will always be in style and they are gorgeous
customer_reviews.author: Yonline

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted for my dress up night! great fit and quality
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Zawada

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very attractive. I am VERY disappointed, the shoe fell apart on the first wear. I really think I should be compensated for this. I'm just so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. They feel comfy and look great.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe but the fit was very uncomfortable across the top of the toes cut into the skin had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Alliene Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or small. I ordered a half size because of the pointy toe
customer_reviews.author: R. B

customer_reviews.title: cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The heel cap broke after about 2 months of light wear...poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Narrow near the toes and bridge. Super cute but uncomfortable:(
customer_reviews.author: kthomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, 1/2 size bigger necessary
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are elegant. The heel height perfect (not too high, not too low). The leather quality perhaps a little cheap looking for shoes of such brand. I had to take 1/2 size bigger than my normal size and it fits fine. All in all: very satisfied of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. GDO

customer_reviews.title: It is not as cute as I thought
customer_reviews.text: They are just not as cute as I thought for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: Rachel209

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes , the color and the material. It fits well but it’s little damaged from the side! Also it’s not in it’s original box!
customer_reviews.author: Manal

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute but run small!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style, texture and overall heel size. I normally wear a 5 and these were way to small in a 5:
customer_reviews.author: KILEY / DELLATHEDOOD

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe seems to be made well & cushioned for comfort. The heel is perfect. I've tried ordering a number of shoes to wear to a wedding and these have been the best.
customer_reviews.author: Patti H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color. Perfect for. Most comfortable soul with heals. Completely in love. #shoelover
customer_reviews.author: sakshi

customer_reviews.title: Gift for wife
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for wife as she has longer work days and walks a good bit. Great shoe for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Heel completely came apart on the first day of wear. Such a disappointment for this brand and a $100 of heels.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Richardson

customer_reviews.title: classic style, great color, runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a true size 9, but found these way too tight. I am returning for a 1/2 size up, they look great and the heel height is perfect for work (office)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much, I ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not hurt it is perfect in the foot
customer_reviews.text: Practice, do not hurt it is perfect in the foot. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ana da Paixão Franco

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable heels for work
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding comfortable work shoes but I can be in these all day! Love that they are available in wide width. So cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brown leather heels
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather shoes for a great price. I usually use size 6.5 and these are true to size and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, will be very nice for an upcoming event and for church from then on.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Rabun

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style in a walkable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I expected. Cute kitten heel, comfortable fit, versatile for my pants or dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Racewalker48

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable and stain
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and comfortable but I received one pair with a stain on it :(
customer_reviews.author: Hanen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, well made. Just seemed to be a little tighter than normal. Next time I will try ordering 9W.
customer_reviews.author: katie miller

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair I wore out. These were a replacement and exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Valblu

customer_reviews.title: Fit is a little narrow which works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Did a lot of walking and even some dancing. Very versatile. Looks great with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish business professional heels!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is just right for that business professional event. Heel is just right. Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable if you do not have wide toes
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the toe area and material hard to break in ( resistant to stretching)
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, it's the shoe color. It's not RED
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used for work, on them for 8 hours a day and still comfy
customer_reviews.author: Marion Legier

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable for a low heel shoe. Sole is also comfy. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Luna

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made for for $99. Plus was too tight it didn't fit. Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: CHICA

product_meta.title: Calvin Klein Women's Gabrianna Pump
product_meta.description:
Kitten heel pump

Calvin Klein is a premier American designer famous for the birth of designer jeans. Known as "the supreme master of minimalism," Calvin Klein is one of the world's leading lifestyle design companies known for minimalist and functional aesthetics. The brand is modern, uniquely sophisticated and offers timeless style. Calvin Klein handbags are designed with clean, classic, and trendy silhouettes. They provide accessible luxury for today's consumer and are the perfect blend of contemporary sophistication.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable" from arch

CALVIN KLEIN is a global lifestyle brand that exemplifies bold, progressive ideals and a seductive, and often minimal, aesthetic. We seek to thrill and inspire our audience while using provocative imagery and striking designs to ignite the senses.
STYLE AND DESIGN: Classic pointed toe pump with a 1.5 inch stiletto kitten heel for all day wear. Finished with a Calvin Klein logo plate at back heel.
COMFORT: Flexible for extended wear, with signature gel pod inserts for comfort and support. A slip-resistant and weather proof sole provides shock absorption with every step.
PERFECT FIT: This style runs true to size.
